website_summaries.verdict: Starts a fire, but also offers several other survival features in a 2-pack at a great price.
pros: Good quality tool for starting fires
Handle doubles as an emergency whistle
cons: The compass is a small button compass and not the most reliable compass ever

customer_reviews.title: This is by far one of the best spark I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: I'm an eagle scout & have lit many fires with flint & steel. This is by far one of the best spark I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great firestarters at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Received product and was instantly surprised at the quality of the two units, and at a very low cost. The magnesium Ferro Rod throws a nice wide spark that burns hot and lasts. I had no problem starting a fire using a piece of birch bark. These also have a built in compass and whistle in the handle, whistle works good, but isn't very loud, haven't tried the compass. Would definitely buy more if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase in a different color and they have worked VERY WELL on my last few camping trips; therefore, I purchased this second set!
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Finally got a chance to test out my new Swiss safe fire starter. I previously had a ferro rod without a grip and found it difficult to hold or find if set on the ground. This starter has a solid grip and the orange color is easier to see. Produces a good spark and got my fire started by the second pull. The compass is an added bonus too. Very happy with this product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip v

customer_reviews.title: This was an amazing product to use and demonstrate to my Nephews
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing product to use and demonstrate to my Nephews. The quality was great. I used this product to teach others how to use flint and steel to create a spark for fire. The button compass was a good tool as well. The paracord and whistle were good as well. You will need to blow hard to make the whistle loud.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Compass is Absolutely No Good, other than that it's GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Ya, cheapo compass is just terrible (It would have you running in circles if you ever needed it, lol), I just threw it away but the ferro rods are great and handy to have for emergency, hiking or camping. I carry a bic also but they can run out or not work if dropped in water etc. I keep one of these in car, other is in my day pack.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because it was a nice size ferro rod with a good handle and I am building both a hiking backpack and an emergency car kit and this included two rods which will supply both kits. I chose bright orange so it would be easy to see in case I dropped it or laid it on the ground. The whistle works well, the compass is a nice addition although basic, but most of all they throw a nice amount of sparks after you get through the coating with the very basic included striker. Shipping and post sale follow up from the seller was top notch so I would buy from this seller again and highly recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Welton

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time I tried to use it
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use this to light the fire pit in our backyard. It broke into two separate pieces after a few minutes of light use. Its ability to create sparks also diminished rapidly in the same amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: does not work
customer_reviews.text: that is not a magnesium rod that is a steel rod, no shavings come off. Scrap and scrap and some tiny little particles barely visible on a black piece of paper appear. Watched a YouTube video of another brand of magnesium fire starter and you could clearly see pieces of magnesium flakes. This one sparks real nice but there is nothing to catch fire with as no magnesium comes off. zero stars- had to put one to get this to submit
customer_reviews.author: john w. hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Pick one up here rather than some dollar store checkout
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted to start his own survival kit and this was one of the first purchases we made. We bought the cheap kit from a box store but the striker bent and snapped on the 4-5th strike. This little bad boy is not going to bend or break and will complement any survival kit. A great way for a young boy to build confidence in themselves!
customer_reviews.author: IronSpider6

customer_reviews.title: Sparks Well
customer_reviews.text: The definitely spark if you push down hard on the stick with the scraper. Ignited my camping stove with it. I don’t like how short the lanyard is though. It makes it awkward to do the motions
customer_reviews.author: T.T.

customer_reviews.title: Good rod but use a knife for striking.
customer_reviews.text: Good size rod for easy striking. Strikes easily with a knife but not as well w the provided scraper. Fluid filled compass works but I'd only use it for very rough estimates.
customer_reviews.author: James Donald Kelley

customer_reviews.title: These things are great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my wife, she’s loves to backpack and hike. It was like Christmas morning when I gave her the fire starter and a ball of dryer lint. She likes the size and the bright orange color. Good job they not only work well but they are fun to.
customer_reviews.author: john deeds

customer_reviews.title: These don't blow.
customer_reviews.text: Neither of the whistles work, the compasses have a few degrees of difference between the two. I mainly bought for the bright orange ends. Easy to find if dropped. Would not buy these again. Do make bright sparks.. The rods are a bit soft.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Nothing works
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible value mostly because not a single tool worked on either one (2 pack). The compasses didn't point north, or even have the same fault and point at the same incorrect direction. The firestarters didn't produce a spark, and the whistles hardly made any noise. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly sized product
customer_reviews.text: We have struggled in the past to use fire starters that were included with survival bracelets or go-packs. The problem has been that these tend to be too small to actually use effectively. We bought a 2-pack of these Swiss Safe fire starters to keep in our camper for emergencies and just fun in general. They are the perfect size for use and travel/carry. I'm looking forward to having the kids race to start their own fires as well. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these abs try them out. SO DISAPPOINTED! Not worth the money. I tried both followed the instructions. The scraper does not scrape off large shavings of magnesium like needed. Used all three sides to see if one would work better than the other. Maybe the rod is the problem. Only small dust particles. I worked so hard I worked up a blister on my index finger. I was going to win! Did not happen. I hope I can get my money back. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Cole

customer_reviews.title: Multiuse and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I am a repeat buyer of this item, so am completely satisfied. The striker/rod produce good sparks, and I can easily start a fire with them. The whistle and compass both work well, and serve as additional useful tools.
customer_reviews.author: TIM

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in case of emergency. I hunt alone a lot, and ya never know what may happen. Or in case something goes down in this country, I’m prepared. Haven’t had the chance yet to use them, because we just had a big ice storm. But when the weather is better I will definitely try them out
customer_reviews.author: Teresa felton

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great value
customer_reviews.text: You need one of these in your house, just in case you never know what can happen. Very good quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Sahylinn Saavedra

customer_reviews.title: do the trick
customer_reviews.text: kind of a one and done deal... i was able to start three fires with my boys, and after that it seemed to lose its punch.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Multifunctional and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have all kinds of survival, EMT and military equipment, kind of a passion for me, especially the EMT stuff. As for these firestarters, they came beautifully packaged, they are well made and easy to use. As for a bonus, they are multifunctional which makes it easy to pack less and have more. I find the whistle isnt amazing, but the fact it has one at all is pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Throw a shower of sparks
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Throws a good shower of sparks and has a pretty good scraper. I’m definitely happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Scuba Steve

customer_reviews.title: Small price to pay for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: Get this for your camping, emergency, or bug out bag. Great value and helps keep you ready. You will always have a way to make a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product , good price , good quality , fast shipping. Very handy to have with me when I go camping.
customer_reviews.author: Toolman

customer_reviews.title: good emergency fire starters
customer_reviews.text: The striker is sharp and will easily give a good spark. The little compass seems to be accurate also.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Louchis

customer_reviews.title: Great Scout Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a bunch of these to give as gifts to my Cubs as they bridge to Boy Scouts. Haven't used them yet, but they look to be quality. The boys will love the compass and whistle...but the fire starter will steal the show! Product arrived quickly and well packaged, even the box they come in is cool as it is made to look like an oversized matchbox.
customer_reviews.author: L. McNichol

customer_reviews.title: Zombie proof
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, instructions are clear and it can’t breakdown. Will be super helpful come zombie apocalypse time. Will use for camping until then. 🤙🏼
customer_reviews.author: RJ Lohan

customer_reviews.title: Creating shavings takes some effort
customer_reviews.text: Used it to start campfire. Creating the shavings takes some real work, but it is worth it if you don't bring a lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: fire starter
customer_reviews.text: I like that the seller explains about his product and that he guarantees it to your satisfaction. That is a good business person. I haven't used it yet but i will and am sure it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Tough, ready and easy
customer_reviews.text: The must have backup to solar and lighters, easy stow and light
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: A little too small. Striker should be longer. Compass is ok, more of a gimmick
customer_reviews.author: Scott Jerome Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than what picture looks like. You can Barely see the compass.
customer_reviews.author: Raymondo Surgio

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, better then bear grills
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, big sparks. Just did wilderness survival merit badge with scouts and worked great with cotton balls.
customer_reviews.author: pknozell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fire starter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one set for camping & my survival gear & after using...another for my bug-out bag & regular use backpack...then a third! That's how great these are- lightweight, compact, durable & reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Hooman Pooya, DVM

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend for survival practice tool
customer_reviews.text: Fire starter swiss safe 2 pack made in China. The compass is cheap dont work. The paracord is a nock off cheap broke easy. The fire striker is 3 inch long made really cheap. But reason I gave 4 stars it will work for my kids for practicing. I wouldn't recommend for hiking and survival.
customer_reviews.author: Josh moore

customer_reviews.title: These work reasonably well. Just.
customer_reviews.text: I've had magnesium blocks and flints that generated far more spark than this item. They work, but just barely.
customer_reviews.author: David Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Metal match worked like a metal match. No issues. Compass really isnt needed. Kinda a novelty but worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: And then there was fire.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. My 11 year old needed it for a scout trip and had no problems as a first time user.
customer_reviews.author: C. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Very good fire starter
customer_reviews.text: They make a big spark when you drag the metal scraper down the length of the rod. The ferro rod is long enough to get the sparks that you need.
customer_reviews.author: James  M

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the price
customer_reviews.text: This fire starter works exactly as expected, and I am very impressed with Swiss Safe overall as a company.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Conrey

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I have small hands so I like the comfortable grip I can get. I also really like the overbuilt nature of it. Will I ever use the compass on it? Probably not but I like it's on there in case I drop my primary one
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Survival kit must have
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for my husband to keep in our UTV with other survival stuff. We haven't tried it get but it looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho Character

customer_reviews.title: Horrible item...
customer_reviews.text: Worste fire starter I've ever purchased. The flint is decent but the striker will rip your hands raw before it will give you a decent strike. Will probably use them as stocking stuffers for people i don't like.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Maynard

customer_reviews.title: works for my husband
customer_reviews.text: He seems satisfied. i prefer a lighter, but he watches a lot of surviver shows
customer_reviews.author: M. mcgee

customer_reviews.title: Great company.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Can't wait for my son to use. Shipping was timely.
customer_reviews.author: Yess

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Erikk
customer_reviews.text: These are nice robust ferrO rods. i like them and ofcourse the bonus compass just in case! Happy n safe fire starting.
customer_reviews.author: Boobface

customer_reviews.title: Lots of hot sparks
customer_reviews.text: These strikers work very well ... throw bunches of hot sparks. Recommend if you are looking for a fire starter. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: bigmac

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, sparky.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and sparky are exactly what you need. The extra features work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken Whisperer

customer_reviews.title: Good productZ
customer_reviews.text: Works well; good spark. Try the whistle a few ways—I had to position just right but then it was loud!
customer_reviews.author: T. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is small enough to keep handy and has a compass and whistle. I have not used it yet but it very practical and easily accessible if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fire source excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent source to start a fire while trying to survive a natural catastrophe or man made one.
customer_reviews.author: Garry

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted for camping trip with my nephew. Love that it also had compass and whistle. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Charissa

customer_reviews.title: Fire Starters
customer_reviews.text: They look great and were delivered promptly, however, I purchased these to give as a gift, they have not been used as of yet?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: First thing I did was attempt to use it. Worked right away! Great product for the price. I bought to set to make sure i had one handy anywhere, house, car, shop just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Joswitch

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the fire starters. They are well made, light and very easy to use. I have no experience with starters but even I got sparks ⚡️ on the first try!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to use for his scout camps. The fire starter works great. The whistle doesn’t work on either of the ones in the two pack I bought. No big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Works as a fire starter...
customer_reviews.text: As a fire starter it's great. As for the other 4 components basically useless... But I didn't get it for the other 4 components so 4 stars!
customer_reviews.author: JESSE

customer_reviews.title: Handy fire starter, compass and whistle all in one
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to see if it works .... and it does! Love this tool with a compass and whistle too. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Diane M.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Keep close to stuff to light - put scraper on wood first and then draw the flint across it
customer_reviews.author: Attilio F.

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Great quality, customer service is top notch. Got an email from the company right after I received the fire starters to help directly deal with any questions or concerns with them.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: Swiss Safe is a higher quality product, than other brands (as pictured) size, ease of use, functionality and durability. Compass is accurate when compared with another (tech). Great product, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fire starter
customer_reviews.text: Great product for teaching grandkids how to start a campfire.
customer_reviews.author: RGM

customer_reviews.title: Great sparks
customer_reviews.text: Throws excellent sparks. I haven’t tried to start a fire with it, but I wouldn’t be surprised if I wouldn’t even need to scrape off any magnesium to light my tinder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful blazes of fire, Great for keeping warm.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality!!! Love the packaging, the product is simple and easy to use. The whistle is loud and great for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Little ShoppingBug

customer_reviews.title: Good to have for routine hiking or in an emergency
customer_reviews.text: Just what we we're needing works well in our EDC. Had the young grandkids practice firestarting with the faro rod and they did great.
customer_reviews.author: Syl

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Throws sparks nicely and not expensive. The whistle works fine but the compass did not work. then again, i bought it for the ferro rod not the compass. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Jasper Bent

customer_reviews.title: Does its job perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Just got this product and tried it out...works just as described..great product..easy to use and great for beginner or experienced camping levels..will continue to buy these
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Did not start my fire
customer_reviews.text: Did not start my fire, had sparks but no fire.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: .. Just get yourself a pair of these!
customer_reviews.text: What to say.. Good product, way better priced than others, nice size rods with a perfect handle color! And guess what, it works!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe I.

customer_reviews.title: They seem good quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Can’t wait to start many of campfires with these.
customer_reviews.author: kevin j collier

customer_reviews.title: They do the trick
customer_reviews.text: Like that these come in various colors. I went with blaze orange so they are easier to find when needed or dropped. Great product...works as stated
customer_reviews.author: RTange

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: for our "just in case" box ~ never know when we might need to light a fire!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super simple foolproof product
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this, it's simple and does what you need
customer_reviews.author: velvet launchpad

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We tried it in the driveway with cotton balls with slightly drizzling rain. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Broken compass.
customer_reviews.text: One of the compasses was broken, the bubble was on top. Also the whistle was hard to blow. Other than that my boyfriend really liked this.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: One for me. One for my kids. I love spending time with them showing them survival skills.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Surber

customer_reviews.title: works great great price
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I like the color options...I purchased the Orange ones. I've lost a black one before...
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Very easy to start a fire. Definitely would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Work easily and really appreciate the helpful hints sent. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Sissyff

customer_reviews.title: Great practical product
customer_reviews.text: Well made and small enough to put in any small pockets
customer_reviews.author: mario

customer_reviews.title: Start a fire under all conditions.
customer_reviews.text: Use for starting fires to cook food or boil water while out on a hike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Swiss safe firestarter review
customer_reviews.text: I received your product and tried it. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ean Smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good at doing the stuff I need it for
customer_reviews.author: isaiah jones

customer_reviews.title: but the fire starter works great and I felt like the price was good for ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure I'd count on the whistle or compass, but the fire starter works great and I felt like the price was good for a 2 pack.
customer_reviews.author: aw_reviews

customer_reviews.title: Misleading & poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first ferro rod. I purchased this set for a backup rod for myself and a starter set for my daughter to learn with. First, the ferro rod does throw a good spark for its size and I started several small fires using lint and cotton balls. Now, the compass and whistle are useless!!! I really didn’t expect them to work, but if your putting them on your product and advertising them, there’s a reasonable expectation that it will work. This item is meant to have 3 working components. Ferro rod, whistle and compass. Only 1 out of the 3 work and for that reason I cannot recommend this product. They’ll go back
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Tavares

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: These fero rods work just fine once you scrape a little of the paint off. I needed something for a belt kit, and these rods are just the right size, being neither too large nor too small. I purchased the orange handle versions, because I don't want to be the guy who loses his firestarter. Compasses worked on both, and the whistle is shrill and loud.
customer_reviews.author: Wandering One

customer_reviews.title: This whistle sucks (not blows)
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these (two 2 packs) and 3 out of 4 of the whistles didn't function. I would imagine these were tested when they were built because no matter how I blew into the whistle portion of this item, it failed to make the expected whistle. It's just poorly designed in that area, but the rest of the functions are fine and I like their design.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fuego

customer_reviews.title: Great price for an ingenious design
customer_reviews.text: I love that there were two, each has a whistle, compass and strike so the small size packs a big wallop. I have an emergency backpack. With global warming crises on the rise, being prepared is important. I tried a few matches, which did not strike without the box and thought I'd give this a try. I have yet to try to start a fire with it, but it seems like an excellent design. It also arrived in one day, and I love supporting small companies.
customer_reviews.author: AhBrightWings

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and highly efficient
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I started a fire in two strokes right out of the box. I would like to see a rod that is about 1 inch longer for added sparking when I’m starting a fire in a damp to wet Pacific NW environment.
customer_reviews.author: Steve McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Well mae and well sounded whistle!
customer_reviews.text: Used to start campfire and in fture Easter fire started. Well made great whistle and antiquate amount of material to start multiple fires. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Quality fire starters
customer_reviews.text: These are well built little survival tools. I like the inclusion of paracord and the whistle but I wanted this primarily for the fire starter. I’ve used it several times and am confident in its construction and it’s durability.
customer_reviews.author: Soma-nambulism

customer_reviews.title: superb service
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and the company that makes these has superior customer service. The insure that every customer is 100 percent satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Whistle doesn't really work...
customer_reviews.text: I mainly got this for the fire starter and whistle.. i have yet to use the fire starter but the whistle does not work. You have to hold it at such a particular angle that its nearly impossible, and i havent gotten it to whistle very loudly
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. Small and can pack it anywhere. Have one to my wife like she will ever need it never leaving the house thought. Put the other in my Hunting gear
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Sykes

customer_reviews.title: Works Great.
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly fine, The compass does not work. Good product and good price.
customer_reviews.author: MAG

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: These firestarters are great. I bought the two pack. One for a gift for my grandson. The other I tried and it was fantastic! Fast shipping and the seller reached out immediately to make sure everything was ok. Recommed!
customer_reviews.author: Kmiller

customer_reviews.title: Swiss Safe 5-in-1 Fire Starter with Compass
customer_reviews.text: Super great, we use for camp, fishing, hike, also give as gift to friends, work as they should.
customer_reviews.author: william w

customer_reviews.title: decent quality 2 pack
customer_reviews.text: Really cool fun to see how it works. Shave some magnesium off and go from there. Seems nice and flammable! Plenty of metal to peel off, doubt it’ll get much use but great for a lightweight bag.
customer_reviews.author: Break_Clays

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Wow, bigger than I thought they were. They come with a metal striker. Bright orange. I put one on my survival knife sheath and one in my SHTF bag.
customer_reviews.author: phil13

product_meta.title: Swiss Safe 5-in-1 Fire Starter with Compass, Paracord and Whistle (2-Pack) for Emergency Survival Kits, Camping, Hiking, All-Weather Magnesium Ferro Rod
feature_bullets: INSTANT FIRE: Start fires in any weather conditions, over 16k strikes at 5,500°F with Magnesium Rod
★ GET 2 FIRE STARTERS (Hunting Orange Color): Each box includes 2 Fire Starters with unique design
MULTI-TOOL DESIGN: Built-in compass, 150dB Whistle, Steel Scraper, 450LB 8core Paracord and Rod
COMPACT & LIGHTWEIGHT: More reliable than matches or lighter, weighs less than 2 ounces, 5" long
100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: No questions refund offered if not satisfied with product for any reason!
